translations.chinese: 三分關中，立秦三將：章邯為雍王，都廢丘；
translations.english: He divided Guanzhong into three parts, establishing the three Qin generals: Zhang Han as King of Yong, capital at Feiqiu;
Sima Xin as King of Sai, capital at Queyang;
Dong Yi as King of Di, capital at Gaonu.

translations.chinese: 楚將瑕丘申陽為河南王，都洛陽。
translations.english: Chu general Xiaqiu Shen Yang as King of Henan, capital at Luoyang.

translations.chinese: 趙將司馬卬為殷王，都 朝歌。
translations.english: Zhao general Sima Ang as King of Yin, capital at Zhaoge.
